title: johnsaributua
author: johnsaributua
content: I recently found information about a fairly large Olympics, and I only focused on 1 major sport in the world, even almost the same thread on gambling.please correct if the thread already exists, I am interested in seeing  This is the website.I also went straight to his twiter.The following are some types of sports that are provided for representatives from various regions to participate in.What do you think about The Olympic Games?Are you interested in the variety of sports that are presented, isn't it interesting?What are your predictions about the current event? (of course the Twitter thread is updated)If the thread already exists feel free to cut sir, I will add the source if possible.

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: If I remember correctly, there is already a 2024 Paris Olympic thread discussion, but the thread in question seems to be dead, the last post in that thread was on May 16. I am not really sure what the procedure is here, I mean, do you have to lock this thread and post this on the already existing thread or just keep it open since the already existing 2024 pairs Olympic thread discussion is dead?Quote from: johnsaributua on October 25, 2023, 02:33:46 PMAre you interested in the variety of sports that are presented, isn't it interesting?I just want to answer this, all are interesting but at the Paris Olympics I am most interested in "breaking" If I remember correctly this is the first Olympics where break dancing will be included in the event, I'd love to see the competitiveness break dancing will show in this event.edit: I almost forgot, here's the thread that I am talking about Paris 2024 Olympic 🏊 Discussion & Predictions 🤺 Summer Games 🏋️ 🥅 🚴🏅
